definition: flat/level/equal/to tie (make the same score)/to draw (score)/calm/peaceful/see also 平聲|平声[ping2 sheng1]
to hand over/to deliver/to pay (money)/to turn over/to make friends/to intersect (lines)/variant of 跤[jiao1]

road/path/CL:條|条[tiao2],股[gu3]/principle/truth/morality/reason/skill/method/Dao (of Daoism)/to say/to speak/to talk/classifier for long thin things (rivers, cracks etc), barriers (walls, doors etc), questions (in an exam etc), commands, courses in a meal, steps in a process/(old) circuit (administrative division)

sentences.english: The accident happened at that unattended crossroads.
sentences.chinese: 事故发生在那个无人看管的平交道。

sentences.english: The patrol car was passing the crossing beside the She-Tzuo-Liao flag station.
sentences.chinese: 巡道车正要通过施厝寮旗站旁的平交道。
我走过火车的铁路平交道口。

sentences.english: The driver whistled before reaching the level-crossing.
sentences.chinese: 货车司机在抵达平交道之前先鸣汽笛。

sentences.english: Yellow box junctions can also be found at railway level crossings or tramway crossings.
sentences.chinese: 也可在铁路平交道口或缆车过路处黄色方格路口。

sentences.english: Taroko Tilting Electric Multiple Unit TEMU1000 was entering Keelung Station.
sentences.chinese: 太鲁阁号倾斜式列车正通过港西街平交道进入基隆站。

sentences.english: The railroad barrier won't go up.
sentences.chinese: 铁道平交道口的栅栏没有上去。

definition: bus information board/street sign for a bus stop/bus stop
Hsinpi township in Pingtung County 屏東縣|屏东县[Ping2 dong1 Xian4], Taiwan
Fenchihu, town in Chiayi County, Taiwan
Toucheng town in Yilan county 宜蘭縣|宜兰县[Yi2 lan2 xian4], Taiwan
Xiluo or Hsilo town in Yunlin county 雲林縣|云林县[Yun2 lin2 xian4], Taiwan
